data.comment: Today's referee, Aurelien Petit, has blown to start the match.
Irvin Cardona for Brestois drives towards goal at Stade Francis-Le Ble. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 3, Reims awarded a free kick in their own half.
Aurelien Petit signals a free kick to Reims in their own half.
Throw-in for Brestois in the half of Reims.
In the minute 8, Throw-in for Reims at Stade Francis-Le Ble.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Brest.
Ball safe as Reims is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 10, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Brestois to take a throw-in in Reims territory.
Aurelien Petit awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 12, Can Reims get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Brestois's half?
Throw-in Brestois.
Reims have a goal kick.
In the minute 15, Reims drive forward but Thomas Foket is judged offside.
Free kick for Brestois in their own half.
Free kick for Reims in their own half.
In the minute 19, Steve Mounie (Brestois) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Corner awarded to Brestois.
Franck Honorat gets his shot on target but fails to score for Brestois.
In the minute 20, In Brest a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Reims awarded a free kick in their own half.
Aurelien Petit signals a free kick to Brestois in their own half.
In the minute 25, Ball goes out of play for a Reims goal kick.
Throw-in for Brestois in their own half.
Reims awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 29, Aurelien Petit signals a free kick to Brestois.
Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead through Franck Honorat.
That's a fine assist from Romain Perraud.
In the minute 33, Aurelien Petit signals a Brestois throw-in in Reims's half.
Brestois to take a throw-in in Reims territory.
Free kick Brestois.
In the minute 36, The ref points to the spot, it's a penalty for Brestois.
Brestois are awarded a penalty at Stade Francis-Le Ble. Steve Mounie takes the kick ... But misses!
Aurelien Petit signals a free kick to Brestois in their own half.
In the minute 41, Brestois awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal kick for Reims at Stade Francis-Le Ble.
Throw-in for Reims at Stade Francis-Le Ble.
In the minute 43, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Reims in their own half.
In Brest Brestois attack through Irvin Cardona. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 44, Aurelien Petit awards Reims a goal kick.
Free kick for Brestois in their own half.
Free kick for Reims in the half of Brestois.
In the minute 45, 2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Aurelien Petit awards Reims a goal kick.
The first-half is over at Stade Francis-Le Ble.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway at Stade Francis-Le Ble.
Christophe Herelle is replacing Ronael Pierre-Gabriel for the home team.
Aurelien Petit signals a free kick to Reims.
In the minute 47, Reims have been awarded a corner by Aurelien Petit.
Goal kick for Brestois at Stade Francis-Le Ble.
In Brest a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 50, Christophe Herelle (Brestois) has received a yellow card from Aurelien Petit.
Brestois awarded a free kick in their own half.
At Stade Francis-Le Ble, Marshall Munetsi has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Brestois's Romain Faivre has run offside.
Irvin Cardona is back on his feet again.
In the minute 52, Irvin Cardona is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In the minute 53, Reims's Nathanael Mbuku is on target but unsuccessful.
Ball goes out of play for a Reims goal kick.
Throw-in for Brestois in their own half.
In the minute 56, It's a goal kick for the home team in Brest.
Brestois awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick Brestois.
In the minute 58, Brestois's Romain Perraud breaks free at Stade Francis-Le Ble. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Reims have a goal kick.
The away team replace Dereck Kutesa with Arber Zeneli.
In the minute 59, The away team have replaced Marshall Munetsi with Moreto Cassama. This is the second substitution made today by David Guion.
Brestois have been awarded a corner by Aurelien Petit.
Steve Mounie's header is off-target for Brestois.
In the minute 61, Aurelien Petit awards Reims a goal kick.
Reims pushes forward through Arber Zeneli, whose finish on goal is saved.
Reims's Valon Berisha gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 63, Ball goes out of play for a Brestois goal kick.
At Stade Francis-Le Ble, Reims are penalized for being offside.
Reims drives forward and Boulaye Dia gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 65, Corner awarded to Reims.
Goal! The away team draw level at 1-1 through Arber Zeneli.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Brest.
In the minute 67, Goal kick for Brestois at Stade Francis-Le Ble.
David Guion (Reims) is making a third substitution, with Kaj Sierhuis replacing El Bilal Toure.
Yunis Abdelhamid for Reims gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 68, Brestois have a goal kick.
Aurelien Petit awards Reims a goal kick.
Goal kick for Brestois at Stade Francis-Le Ble.
In the minute 70, Aurelien Petit awards the away team a throw-in.
Brestois make their second substitution with Gaetan Charbonnier replacing Irvin Cardona.
Reims's Boulaye Dia is whistled for offside at Stade Francis-Le Ble.
In the minute 73, Corner awarded to Reims.
Ball goes out of play for a Brestois goal kick.
Aurelien Petit signals a free kick to Brestois in their own half.
In the minute 75, Aurelien Petit signals a Brestois throw-in in Reims's half.
Brestois have been awarded a corner by Aurelien Petit.
Goal! Steve Mounie gives Brestois a 2-1 lead in Brest.
In the minute 80, Reims awarded a free kick in their own half.
Hiang`a Mbock is replacing Franck Honorat for Brestois at Stade Francis-Le Ble.
Throw-in for Reims in the half of Brestois.
In the minute 83, Reims are pushing forward but Ghislain Konan's finish is wide of the goal.
Brestois have a goal kick.
David Guion is making the team's fourth substitution at Stade Francis-Le Ble with Moussa Doumbia replacing Nathanael Mbuku.
In the minute 85, Ball safe as Reims is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Corner awarded to Reims.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Brest.
In the minute 87, Can Brestois get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Reims's half?
Throw-in for Reims in the half of Brestois.
Arber Zeneli of Reims smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in Reims.
Aurelien Petit signals a Brestois throw-in in Reims's half.
The match has come to a close in Brest. The final score is 2-1.
Cristian Battocchio is on a sub for Romain Faivre for Brestois.
